Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers and Michael Vick or as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. ''I'm always trying to get better,'' he said. I'm trying to make better decisions, smarter decisions. I try not to put us in a bad situation.
